Turning this on will reduce image size and quality to help use less cellular data.

Support Android 4.1+, no root permission needed.
Auto Install requires you to authorize on the phone, it\'s safe to use without any risks.

Enable "APKPure Auto Install", to keep APKPure "Auto Install" running smoothly.

"APKPure Auto Install" can help you click all install buttons when installing or updating apps, you don't have to check the phone all the time.

When enabling this feature, you may receive system risk warnings, please tap "OK" to turn the accessibility switch "ON".

To ensure APKPure well functioning, please add APKPure to your Cleaning App "White List".

The above mentioned functions support Android 4.1+, no root permission needed. We promise never ever collecting any of your personal information in this accessibility service. Please feel free to contact us with any problems.

It looks like something you posted doesn\'t follow our %1$s. We don\'t allow posts that bully private individuals or harass anyone on APKPure. This could include inappropriate images, photos or videos of physical bullying, or any other post intended to degrade or shame a specific person. \n%2$s \nIf you think this was a mistake, please %3$s.

This temporary block will last %1$s days, and you won\'t be able to post on APKPure until it\'s finished. If you post something that goes against our %2$s again, you account will be blocked for another 30 days. Please keep in mind that people who repeatedly post things that aren't allowed on APKPure may have their accounts permanently disabled. \nIf you think this was a mistake, please %3$s.

We removed the post you reported!
We reviewed the post you reported for harassment. Since it violated our %1$s, we removed it. Thanks for your report. We let %2$s know that the post has been removed, but not who reported it.
